mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CPN_CHANNEL /* 쿠폰 채널 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CPN_CHANNEL_PK(P),FK_EZC_CPN_EZC_CPN_CHANNEL(R),SYS_C0011321(C) */ AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CPN_CHANNEL_PK(P),FK_EZC_CHANNEL_MNG_EZC_CPN_CHA(R),SYS_C0011322(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CPN_CHANNEL /* 쿠폰 채널 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CPN_CHANNEL /* 쿠폰 채널 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CPN_CHANNEL.CPN_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CPN_CHANNEL SET /* 쿠폰 채널 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CPN_CHANNEL /* 쿠폰 채널 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
